ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Guise
ygData.msgSnippet: Have to agree.  Kind of depressing to see all these people say Well go see if the group camping it will let you loot the mask  While I have no problem with
ygData.messageBody:
Have to agree. Kind of depressing to see all these people say "Well go see
if the group camping it will let you loot the mask" While I have no problem
with people doing it I strongly feel people should go camp the SoB
(especially when they're high enough to) and get it themselves. A good
group at 36 can easily take that room. I've done it with a group of 30's.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath

> At 01:48 PM 8/8/00 -0400, you wrote:
> >well first thing to do is hope someone is camping the tower in guk (where
> >the ass and supplier spawn)
>
> geez, whatever happened to forming a group and going to kill the ass/supp
spawn?
>
